A versatile tool used for holding workpieces firmly in place while working on them.', 'Tap Wrench - Used to hold or turn taps, dies and other threaded tools during their use.', 'Needle Files - Small metal files with pointed ends designed for precision filing of small gaps and contours.', 'File Clips - CLUE: Sometimes we can't see the wood for . . . . . . .
OUTPUT: ['Trees - When people get so caught up in details, they fail to see the bigger picture ("can\'t see the wood for the trees").', 'Forests - A dense collection of trees often symbolizes being overwhelmed by complex information or situations.', 'Surroundings - This implies a failure to notice what is around us in our immediate environment.', 'Nature - It refers to the natural world, which people might miss when focused on specific elements (trees).', 'Landscape - Represents the overall view or setting, beyond just individual trees.', 'Environment - This can mean the surroundings and conditions in which an organism lives; failing to see it often implies a lack of awareness.', 'Ecosystem - A complex network that people may overlook when concentrating on small details.', 'Habitat - Refers to the natural home or environment where something lives, sometimes not visible in day-to-day observations.', 'Wilderness - Unspoiled and uninhabited areas, which can be easily disregarded amidst urban preoccupations.', 'Flora - The plant life of a region; neglecting it symbolizes overlooking the broader living environment.', 'Fauna - Animal life in a particular habitat that might go unnoticed when focusing on other concerns.', "Biodiversity - Variety and variability among living organisms, which people may not appreciate if they're too focused on the immediate.", 'Terrain - The physical features of land; someone might miss seeing it because of their narrow focus.', "Geography - Earth's landscapes, environments, and places; often overlooked when caught up in details.", 'Outdoors - Encompassing natural spaces that may be taken for granted or overlooked.', 'Vista - A pleasing view, which could represent what people miss out on when distracted by minutiae.', 'Panorama - An extensive and comprehensive view, contrasting with a limited perspective due to preoccupation.', 'Simplicity - The quality of being easy to understand or do; the opposite of complexity that might cause someone to miss broader perspectenasity).', 'Cohesion - A unity of different elements in a system, often overlooked when focusing on individual components.', 'Infrastructure - Fundamental facilities and systems serving a country or organization; sometimes ignored amidst daily operations.', 'Symbiosis - Interconnectedness between living organisms; may be missed by those only considering their own needs.', 'Genetics - The study of heredity and the variation of inherited characteristics, which can be overlooked in focused areas like personal development or specific projects.']
